Source code for gen3

[docs]class Gen3:
    """

    A class for interacting with the Gen3 services.

    Args:
        endpoint (str): The URL of the data commons.
        auth_provider (Gen3Auth): A Gen3Auth class instance.

    Examples:
        This generates the Gen3Index class pointed at the sandbox commons while
        using the credentials.json downloaded from the commons profile page.

        >>> endpoint = "https://nci-crdc-demo.datacommons.io"
        ... auth = Gen3Auth(endpoint, refresh_file="credentials.json")
        ... sub = Gen3Submission(endpoint, auth)

    """

    def __init__(self, endpoint, auth_provider=None, index_service_location="index"):
        self.endpoint = endpoint
        self.auth_provider = auth_provider
